<<<<<<< HEAD
The trial of a Christians estate: or a discouerie of the causes, degrees, signes and differences of the apostasie both of the true Christians and false in a sermon preached in London by Master Paul Bayne, and afterward sent in writing by him to his friend W.F. Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.
[6], 23, [1] p.
Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sold at his shop vnder S. Peters Church in Cornhill, and in Popes head Alley, London : 1618.
On Hebrews X, 39. The first leaf is blank. Running title reads: The triall of a Christians estate. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[6], 23, [1] p.
